explanations.A: Use the fact 3 lbs = 48 ounces to work out how many ounces in one lb and then you can work out the ounces in 2 lbs
explanations.B: This is how many ounces are in 1 lb but the question is asking us how many ounces in 2 lbs...
explanations.C: 3 lbs = 48 ounces therefore 1 lb = 16 ounces. If we have 2 lbs 2 x 16 = 32 so 2 lbs = 32 ounces
